wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Henry Frederick Bouverie  (11 July 1783 – 14 November 1852) was a British Army officer.

response: * Hon. Edward Bouverie (1738–1810), who married Harriett Fawkener and was the father of Edward Bouverie, Lt.-Gen. Sir Henry Frederick Bouverie.

response: *1843–1852: Lt-Gen. Sir Henry Frederick Bouverie, GCB, GCMG
